issues.title: Review guardrails inventory and gap analysis
issues.body: Walk through `REVIEW/BOOTSTRAP_GUARDRAILS/INVENTORY.md` and `GAP_ANALYSIS.md`. Capture questions, confirm scope, and document any missing context before migration planning is locked.
acceptance_criteria: Inventory notes acknowledged by Docs, Architecture, and Ops representatives.
Gap severities agreed upon or updated with rationale.
Open questions tracked in follow-up discussion notes.

issues.title: Sign off on guardrails migration plan
issues.body: Review `REVIEW/BOOTSTRAP_GUARDRAILS/MIGRATION_PLAN.md` for completeness (scope, owners, sequencing, rollback). Approve or adjust effort estimates before implementation PRs are authorized.
acceptance_criteria: Named owners or teams recorded for each plan artifact.

issues.title: Validate docs map and glossary accuracy
issues.body: Cross-check `docs/DOCS_MAP.md` and `docs/DOCS_GLOSSARY.md` against the repository. Ensure file listings, purpose statements, and definitions reflect current state and desired conventions.
acceptance_criteria: File listings in DOCS_MAP match repository contents.
Glossary definitions agreed upon by stakeholders.
Any future sections needing updates are tagged with owners.

issues.title: Authorize transition to guardrails implementation phase
issues.body: Hold planning review to confirm readiness for implementation work (docs drafting, label canon creation, module reviews). Capture meeting notes and formal approval to proceed via follow-up batch.
acceptance_criteria: Planning stakeholders sign off on proceeding to implementation.
Outstanding risks documented with mitigation owners.
Next-phase issue batch or project board link shared.
